member.name: ID2D1ImageSourceFromWic.EnsureCached
member.summary: Ensures that a specified region of the image source cache is populated. This method can be used to minimize glitches by performing expensive work to populate caches outside of a rendering loop. This method can also be used to speculatively load image data before it is needed by drawing routines.
member.param: Specifies the region of the image, in pixels, that should be populated in the cache. By default, this is the entire extent of the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1ImageSourceFromWic.EnsureCached
member.summary: Ensures that a specified region of the image source cache is populated. This method can be used to minimize glitches by performing expensive work to populate caches outside of a rendering loop. This method can also be used to speculatively load image data before it is needed by drawing routines.
member.param: Specifies the region of the image, in pixels, that should be populated in the cache. By default, this is the entire extent of the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1ImageSourceFromWic.GetSource
member.summary: Retrieves the underlying bitmap image source from the Windows Imaging Component (WIC).
member.param: On return contains the bitmap image source.

member.name: ID2D1ImageSourceFromWic.TrimCache
member.summary: This method trims the populated regions of the image source cache to just the specified rectangle.
member.param: Specifies the region of the image, in pixels, which should be preserved in the image source cache. Regions which are outside of the rectangle are evicted from the cache. By default, this is an empty rectangle, meaning that the entire image is evicted from the cache.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1ImageSourceFromWic.TrimCache
member.summary: This method trims the populated regions of the image source cache to just the specified rectangle.
member.param: Specifies the region of the image, in pixels, which should be preserved in the image source cache. Regions which are outside of the rectangle are evicted from the cache. By default, this is an empty rectangle, meaning that the entire image is evicted from the cache.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1ImageSourceFromWic
member.summary: Produces 2D pixel data that has been sourced from WIC.
